section.para: Standard Journals Groups are used to define groups of Standard Journals that are often posted together, such as during period end. To access the master list of Standard Journal Groups, select the "List Standard Journal Groups" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Standard Journals Groups" screen displays information on all existing Standard Journal Groups, including Journal Group name and Journal Group description.
